metadata.subject: The Year Ahead: A World of Change (Short Version Below For Convenience)

organizations: Bank of America Global Wealth and Investment Management
Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith, Inc.

relationships.description: Managing Director at Bank of America/Merrill Lynch
Chief Investment Officer of Bank of America Global Wealth and Investment Management

analysis.purpose: Investment strategy communication and market outlook analysis for 2017
analysis.significance: Shows financial institution's analysis of post-2016 election market conditions and investment strategy recommendations

notable_quotes: "We expect business, consumer and investor confidence to continue to head higher well into 2017, with most of the newly expected growth to come in 2018, which should underpin equities for most of the year."
"We have moved from a 'get paid to wait' core portfolio theme to a more cyclical- and value-oriented theme in multi-asset portfolios"

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - this is a standard investment analysis communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is legitimate financial analysis and investment strategy communication

public_knowledge.context: Standard investment analysis and market outlook communication typical for financial institutions

analysis.summary: Paul Morris of Bank of America/Merrill Lynch shares an investment outlook for 2017, analyzing market trends post-2016 election and recommending portfolio repositioning toward cyclical and value-oriented investments based on expected fiscal reflation and economic growth.
